individual_performance_page.title: Individual Performance
individual_performance_page.heading: Individual Performance ðŸª›
individual_performance_page.hint: To get started, select a technician from the toolbar.

average_ticket_resolution_time_chart.heading: Average Ticket Resolution Time
average_ticket_resolution_time_chart.tooltip: The time it takes to resolve a ticket is defined as the period from when it is created until it is marked as resolved, closed, or canceled. A ticket is considered resolved in any of these cases.

average_ticket_first_contact_time_chart.heading: Average Time to First Contact
average_ticket_first_contact_time_chart.tooltip: This is the time it takes for a ticket to be classified as first contact, meaning the period from when the ticket is received until it is assigned or canceled.
